argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_df-rel | |- ( Rel R <-> R C_ ( _V X. _V ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_biimpi | |- ( Rel R -> R C_ ( _V X. _V ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_ssbrd | |- ( Rel R -> ( A R B -> A ( _V X. _V ) B ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_imp | |- ( ( Rel R /\ A R B ) -> A ( _V X. _V ) B ) |
| 5 |  | #P_brxp | |- ( A ( _V X. _V ) B <-> ( A e. _V /\ B e. _V ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_sylib | |- ( ( Rel R /\ A R B ) -> ( A e. _V /\ B e. _V ) ) |
